metadata.title: Gov declares 9, 10 Muharram as public holiday

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jul 3 (APP): The federal government has officially declared Saturday, July 5, and Sunday, July 6, 2025, as public holidays on account of 9th and 10th Muharram-ul-Haram (Ashura 1447 A.H). According to a notification issued by the Cabinet Division following the Prime Minister's approval, these days will be observed as public holidays across the country for both five-day and six-day working week offices.
